description:
tools: Added support for LFENCE, MFENCE and SFENCE assembly ops to the 386 cmd code.
(These assembly ops are already present in the amd64 cmd code).

Added entries to the end of each array / enum

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a7756e3a5e71 ***

8a, 8l: add LFENCE, MFENCE, SFENCE

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5650076

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
